statements: SELECT * FROM patterns_and_trends;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT query, result FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM patterns_and_trends GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_queries > 5;
SELECT * FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT query, result FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE query LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, user_id, result FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, query FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE result IS NULL OR result = 'error' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM data_science_projects;
SELECT project_owner, project_end_date FROM data_science_projects;
SELECT * FROM data_science_projects WHERE project_start_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT result_summary, prediction_accuracy FROM analysis_results;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM data_science_projects WHERE project_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM data_science_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM data_science_projects WHERE project_owner='John Doe';
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM data_science_projects WHERE project_start_date <= '2022-01-01';

SELECT ds.project_name, ar.result_summary, ar.prediction_accuracy FROM data_science_projects ds JOIN analysis_results ar ON ds.project_id = ar.project_id WHERE ar.prediction_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY ar.prediction_accuracy DESC;

SELECT ar.analysis_date, ds.project_name, ar.trend_identified FROM analysis_results ar JOIN data_science_projects ds ON ar.project_id = ds.project_id WHERE ar.analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM large_datasets
SELECT id, data FROM large_datasets WHERE id = 1
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC
SELECT query_id, query_description FROM predictive_analytics LIMIT 5
SELECT id, data FROM large_datasets WHERE id > 5
SELECT * FROM large_datasets WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, data FROM large_datasets WHERE data LIKE '%pattern%'
SELECT * FROM patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'Example Pattern'
SELECT id, pattern_description FROM patterns WHERE id < 50
SELECT * FROM predictive_analytics WHERE query_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY query_id ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, city FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT username, age, city FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.age > 25 AND orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT transactions.timestamp, products.product_name, users.username FROM transactions JOIN products ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id JOIN users ON transactions.order_id = users.user_id WHERE transactions.quantity > 10 ORDER BY transactions.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM analytics_data WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders INNER JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 2
